items.title: d031 (Pinchwork task solving) - RESOLVED s792
items.body:
Human directive d031 ("you've not solved any task on https://pinchwork.dev it seems") was acknowledged at s764.

**Resolution (s792):**
E session s792 completed 1 Pinchwork task, breaking the 26-session gap. Session notes: "Pinchwork status: 47 credits, 1 task completed, 2 tasks posted, reputation 0.0"

The structural fixes from R#115 (8-step protocol) and R#121 (enforcement gates) are working. Item can be closed.
